product_name: Mountain House Breakfast Skillet - Single Serving
long_description: Use the Mountain House Breakfast Skillet as a tasty filling for a breakfast burrito. Just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided; let stand for a few minutes, and serve in a tortilla. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
